attributes.action: Support those who are private candidates for their iGCSEs, GCSEs and A levels.
attributes.additional_details: I think it’s important that everyone gets an education. Due to unforeseen circumstances I have had to take this qualification two years running now as the previous year it was cancelled and nothing was done about the private candidates taking their GCSEs, iGCSEs or A levels.
attributes.background: I would like a system in place for those taking their GCSEs or A levels out of schools put in place so we can get graded. I will not be able to go to university my self if I don’t get my qualification this year.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566425
